title: Write an application to the principal of your college for setting up a debating club in your college.
data:
Subject: Prayer for setting up a debating club.

Sir,
We beg to state that we are the students of your college. Our college is one of the best college in our area. But it is sorry to say that our college has no debating club. But It is very necessary for us. We can learn many important things from there. So we need a debating club in our college to develop our skills and knowledge.

We therefore pray and hope that you would kindly enough to set up a debating club in our college.

Your most obediently,
The students of your college.
